Index.subtitle: Software Developer & Web and Mobile Applications
Index.name: Assil Dekhil
Index.description: As a Master 2 student in Computer Science and Mobility at the University of Haute-Alsace, I am looking for an end-of-studies internship in web and mobile development. My academic background and practical experience have allowed me to acquire solid expertise in the design and development of modern applications. I would like to put my skills to the service of an innovative company for an internship lasting 5 to 6 months starting in February 2026.

project1.title: GestionPresta
project1.description: GestionMagasin is a Flutter store management app designed to help users efficiently manage their customers, orders, products, and tasks. This app is primarily aimed at small and medium-sized businesses looking to digitize and simplify their store management.

project2.title: ShareElec
project2.description: ShareElec is a secure and intuitive web platform that facilitates electricity exchanges between individuals. Designed to support the energy transition and decentralized production, it allows for simple contracting of energy transactions, while promoting energy autonomy and the optimization of local resources. The platform also integrates the Stripe online payment method, guaranteeing fast, secure, and reliable transactions for all users.

project3.title: E_Banking
project3.description: Development of a mobile application security module integrating two-factor authentication. This project strengthened user account protection by adding an additional layer of security, helping to prevent unauthorized access and data theft.

project4.title: STT
project4.description: Development of an application allowing travelers to purchase tickets online for a specific date, with integration of secure payment via Stripe. After payment, a ticket generated with a QR code is automatically sent to WhatsApp thanks to Twilio. The application also allows ticket inspectors to verify ticket validity by scanning QR codes, ensuring fast and reliable inspection.

project8.title: JobFinder
project8.description: Development of a web platform facilitating the connection between recruiters and job seekers. Recruiters can post offers, while candidates can easily search and apply for jobs that match their profile.

project6.title: Restauroni
project6.description: Development of an application dedicated to the complete management of a restaurant, including the management of menus, orders, reservations and customer monitoring, in order to optimize the organization and improve the customer experience.

project7.title: A7ki
project7.description: Design and development of a social network platform promoting interaction between users through content sharing, messaging and the creation of online communities.

project5.title: 9raya
project5.description: Development of a versatile web-based solution for education and training organizations. The platform automates the management of human resources (students, teachers, parents, staff), registrations, timetables, subjects, classes, and report cards. It also includes an instant messaging system to facilitate interaction between teachers and students, as well as an archiving module to ensure the traceability of the institution's data.

project9.title: V2V Connection Simulation Tool
project9.description: Desktop application developed in C++ and the Qt 6 framework for the graphical interface. Our solution connects to the OpenStreetMap API to retrieve real road layouts, on which we then simulated the random movement of several vehicles. Each vehicle is represented by a moving point on the map, following a valid trajectory.
